Free Brick Breaker for a LIMITED TIME! GET IT NOW!

Rebeloid VR: The Evolution of Brick Breaker Games

Embark on a journey into space with Rebeloid! We're reintroducing the classic block-breaking frenzy, reminiscent of timeless games like DX-Ball and Arkanoid, but now in cutting-edge VR technology.

Features:

Show Your Reflexes:
Quick reflexes and dexterity are crucial as you deflect the ball, evade enemy lasers, and tightly grip your ship while hurling the ball to shatter various cubes, vanquishing challenging enemies, and defeating formidable bosses.

Cubes with Unique Traits:
Shatter regular cubes, detonate explosive ones, and stay vigilant for invisible ones. Avoid wasting time on unbreakable golden cubes and exercise patience with silver ones. Beware, as some may respawn to create infinite obstacles. These truly are the neurons of this galaxy.

Collect Power-ups:
Acquire plasma balls and lasers to swiftly dispatch enemies and blow up cubes. Triple your ball for rapid cube destruction, or enlarge your ship to effortlessly catch and control the ball. Beware of negative power-ups, which you can also call power-downs!

Embark on an Unforgettable Journey:
Immerse yourself in this enhanced VR experience within a one-of-a-kind realm, traversing an intergalactic odyssey woven into a captivating sci-fi tapestry set within a fascinating galaxy. Encounter formidable adversaries like The Krugg at the end and emerge as the hero after an epic showdown.
